snippet.title: Faerie Afterlight Alpha Trailer
snippet.description:
Faerie Afterlight is a Platformer-Metroidvania video game that allows the player to control both two characters simultaneously. The second character helps the main character by interacting with the game world and controlling enemies.

Alpha Build is available to download: https://claygamestudio.itch.io/faerie-afterlight
Join our discord here: https://discord.gg/Pqq9hRs
